title: how riot cheats game
body:
extremely easy : they put 3 trashes in your games and that becomes uncarryable.
It's easy as that!
And it's extremely easy to prove : 
https://matchhistory.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/EUW1/4126702633/2033735263136736?tab=overview
3/10 6/10 4/7, most of the game they didn't have a single kill
https://matchhistory.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/EUW1/4126786603/2033735263136736?tab=overview
no comment
https://matchhistory.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/EUW1/4126890902/2033735263136736?tab=overview
basically kata was AFK while diana was doing whatever she wanted and never losing a single hp on her tower. And I'm always the one who gets this type of shit mid, never the other team. So it cannot be a coincidence : riot deliberatelly give me trash mids to ruin the game.
https://matchhistory.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/EUW1/4126879555/2033735263136736?tab=overview
despite what kda says, yorrick fed by trolling. He constantely let mundo roam and gank me, and while we could kill him, he stayed behind and watched us die. Then he said "Im not the one who died" lol. Typical deadweight. Ekko was plain bad, bot lost lane AND jungle by letting their bot constantely steal our blue with lee 3v1.

And of course you never see streamers having teams like that more than once. It's very rare.
Because riot deliberatelly does this.

replies.body:
this implies a couple of things:

1) that they KNOW who is going to feed and when, and then purposefully match them with you 
2) if streamers are just getting "lucky" youre basically just saying they have no skill and dont deserve their rank
3) that someone not doing what you want immediately means their trolling

this is all simply disproven by the fact that people smurfing CONSISTENTLY get to their elo. if riot was selecting who climbs to where, it would look like 1-2 accounts in diamond, but the rest not getting out of high bronze.

Which is more likely:

A: there is a huge, complicated conspiracy to keep _you_ in wood V, which benefits nobody. It has to be you specifically, because if everyone was matched with feeders, it would balance out.

B: you belong in wood V
your silver 4 with a 41%wr that is no ones fault but your own

You aren't exactly helping your case with those match history links. You didn't play well in any of those matches. 1/1/1 with 2 of 17 KP in a 27 minute game as the jungler? 12 deaths? 7/9/2? 2/8/4? What are you trying to prove?

Do you even know how computer science works?
Do you think they are manually selecting which players get together in a team?
Is there a list of players they deliberately match with trolls? How?
lol you're so inept at computers, congratulations finding the "post" button
Your replies are 4 days late, I'd be careful with necroing {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
24/7 on your computer and you still don't know how it works {{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
